review_data.title: Klein und fein!
review_data.content: Herrlich schön gelegen, entspannte Stimmung, freundliche Bedienung! Ein kleines Bijou und ein Geheimtip ;-)

review_data.title: Cute little cafe
review_data.content: I really like this little and cute cafe off the beaten path. I’ve visited a few times in the past and never was disappointed with my experience there. I had various hot and cold coffees here and all were really good. I would visit again...More

review_data.title: Smallest and finest hotel in town !
review_data.content: This family-run business offers 2 rooms for an unforgettable stay in the heart of the historic center of Zurich, with a view on St. Peters Church and next to Paradeplatz, Bahnhofstrasse and Lindenhof. I stayed in the room called Maurice, a charming room on two...More

review_data.title: Un merveilleux restaurant
review_data.content: Dans de petit ruelle montant vers rennweg ce petit restaurant avec une ardoise en français à l'extérieur. Nous tenions à...More

review_data.title: Sehr liebevoll eingerichtetes
review_data.content: Sehr liebevoll eingerichtetes Bistro, welches einen ins Paris der goldigen 20er verschlägt. Top für Brunch. Reservation aufgrund der Nachfrage empfohlen.

review_data.title: Great Local Cafe Tucked on Quiet Street Near Busy Shopping Area
review_data.content: We stayed at the Hotel Kindli, very close to this cafe. After sticking our heads into the overcrowded touristy places on the main shopping street, we luckily discovered this little cafe (about 20 tables) tucked in a little alley just behind (access from street parallel...More

review_data.title: Wonderful
review_data.content: Been there for a quick breakfast in search of good french croissants. The French croissants are great and the pan au chocolat even better. Also, the Cafe is nested in a scenic tiny side alley and reminds in a way of Montmartre in Paris.

review_data.title: "...what a difference a place makes..."
review_data.content: An elegant little haven in the heart of the sweet old streets of Zürich. A perfect pit stop for a loner like myself.

review_data.title: Cadre convivial, accueil charmant et brunch délicieux !
review_data.content: Nous y avons passé un super moment entre amis dimanche et nous nous sommes régalés, je recommande vivement le Montmartre...More

review_data.title: Ein Bijou von einem Bistro

review_data.title: Klein, fein und viel Herzblut.

review_data.title: ok coffeeplace, but overprized
review_data.content: Went there in the afternoon to have a hot chocolate. On the plus side the coffeeplace looks nice, french-style, and the service was friendly. The hot chocolate, which is advertised as house-made was not more than ok, and definitely overpriced, even for Zurich. For the...More

review_data.title: Delicous Tartare
review_data.content: Visit this lovely place at Rennweg. Service is lovely and food delicious. I will visit this nice place again.

review_data.title: Französisches Flair

review_data.title: Still a cozy café, even after the name change
review_data.content: The young lady working on my visit was very friendly and welcoming. The place is a small hidden treasure in the neighborhood. I ordered my oat milk hot chocolate (8.20CHF) and enjoyed the relaxed atmosphere and tasty hot chocolate. I removed one star for the...More

review_data.title: Nettes kleines charmantes Bistro
review_data.content: Kleine Karte, Speisen sehr gute Qualität, etwas teuer. Sehr gute Weine, freundlicher Service, tolle Atmosphäre. Ein kleines Juwel.
